1010110010111111 0111001110101010 1 -> sum: 0010000001101010, cout: 1

1010011110101111 0010010100001110 1 -> sum: 1100110010111110, cout: 0

0011010000011001 1011011101010001 1 -> sum: 1110101101101011, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
